page.title: 01LANDSCAPE
page.content: This 4x3km block is situated about 4km due east of Liverpool.It is bounded on the north by East Prescot Road (A57),on the south by a motorway (M62),on the west by Queen's Drive (A5058) and on theeast by Tarbock Road /Archway Road /Bluebell Lane. This suburban area is composed mainly of housing estates(built in the 1930's) with the usual amenities- shops,schools,parks etc. For purposes of the survey, the 4x3km D-Block was divided into twelve 1km squares, thus: A B C D E F G H I J K L The schools participating in the scheme were each allocated one or two km squares. A : Yew Tree Comprehensive School B : Yew Tree Comprehensive School
